projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Modified Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Acoustic Key Logger
projects.bodyText:
- The application can analyze a given audio recording for key press sounds.
 -  Using advanced sound processing algorithms, it's capable of identifying individual key presses and their timings.
 - Application has an easy-to-use and visually pleasing user interface, simplifying the user interaction.

projects.title: Chrome-Web-Extensions-Security-Checker
projects.bodyText:
- Website that allows to analyse the properties of a browser extension
 - Supports legacy extensions
 - Allows visualisation of the risks of an extension without installing

projects.title: Wellbeing-Exeter-App
projects.bodyText:
- A project to help students connect with their peers during online and blended learning, promoting student community through the gamification of engagement.
 - This application is structured as a forum, allowing students to engage in discussions with their peers and a way to incentivise students to go to lectures and participate in the community by providing points that will contribute to a leaderboard placement.

projects.title: ReLearn-Android-App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that allows the user to use the phone on a brand new way
 - Less time spend on the phone by having only the essentials

projects.title: YouTube Channel Analyzer
projects.bodyText:
- Python script that leverages the YouTube Data API to provide insights into your subscribed channels and your viewing habits.
 - Helps you identify the channels you watch the most and the least, assisting you in deciding which channels to unsubscribe from.

projects.title: Custom Bandit Plugin
projects.bodyText: - Bandit plugin to detect credit card information with a specific pattern

projects.title: Smart-Alarm-Flask
projects.bodyText:
- Simple website with alarm integration
 - Api use to get the news and weather information
 - Options to create and access notes locally

projects.title: Task Tracker
projects.bodyText:
- A simple Task Tracker web app made with **Angular 12**.
 - Uses **mock JSON server** to get, add, delete or update tasks.

projects.title: GoLang Alexa
projects.bodyText:
- Alexa like features using go lang.
 - Text to speech.
 -Use API to gather information to provide answers to the questions
